channel.title: Prayer Button Issue
channel.description:
I am positive that this is a client related issue, due to the fact that I recently switched clients. I am satisfied with the new client, except for one issue-- none of the prayer buttons are working. The prayer buttons have no effect, and they don't drain my prayer whatsoever. I can even do this:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/122gdvk.png[/img]
So does anyone have a solution to this problem. It would be incredibly helpful just to let me know which file contains the prayers. Please, anything, i'm desperate for a solution.

item.title: Prayer Button Issue
item.dc:creator: @baba_mhillo baba mhillo
item.description:
@baba_mhillo wrote:

Ok, so i think that sense i got a new client the button Ids changed. How can i find these new ids?

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer Button Issue
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

Actually, that issue is almost completely server sided.
It appears that you have to write the entire prayer method, with prayer draining, switching, delays and effects, yourself.
What source did you get that doesn’t have prayers down?

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer Button Issue
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

you have to code the server sided effects for the interface…

im sure the actionbuttonids are different than previous.
